data.title: Rowan Atkinson: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Rowan Atkinson: Check out the list of all Rowan Atkinson movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Rowan Atkinson news on Times of India.
data.text:
'Wonka' premiere: Critics and reviewers praise Timothée Chalamet's amazing performance and skills

etimes.in / Nov 29, 2023, 20:17 (IST)

The prequel to 'Charlie and the Chocolate Factory,' titled 'Wonka,' directed by Paul King and starring Timothée Chalamet, has garnered overwhelmingly positive reactions. Chalamet's performance as a young Willy Wonka is praised for its infinite charm. The film explores Wonka's early struggles to establish his first chocolate shop, featuring a stellar cast. Critics commend the movie's winning blend of charm, whimsy, and poignant moments, propelled by lively musical numbers. Despite some noting a disparity in story and tone, 'Wonka' is celebrated as a super charming delight, resonating well with audiences.

Love Actually director Richard Curtis admits that the 20-year-old film lacked diversity

etimes.in / Dec 01, 2022, 17:52 (IST)

Rom com Love Actually clocks 20 years this month. The film that was released in 2003 is still as popular as it was when it was first released, and only yesterday it was voted as the Christmas season’s third best all-time favourite movie after Home Alone and Elf in a poll conducted by Showcase Cinemas in the UK.

Sidharth Sagar makes a comeback on 'The Kapil Sharma Show'

IANS / Sep 05, 2022, 18:11 (IST)

Stand-up comedian Sidharth Sagar, who last appeared on the Zee Comedy Show, has been roped in to play a pivotal character on 'The Kapil Sharma Show'. He talks about making a comeback on the show after 2017: "I was doing a show, 'Case to Banta Hai', in which my performance was appreciated a lot. I guess that's how I was offered 'The Kapil Sharma Show' and here I am."

Rowan Atkinson explains main purpose of a joke

ANI / Jun 22, 2022, 10:43 (IST)

British actor and comedian Rowan Atkinson defended the act of comedy, sharing that the main purpose of a joke is 'to offend' or have the 'potential to offend'.

Join Times Verified’s chain-breaking brigade to fight against ‘epidemic’ of viral fake news

TNN / Dec 09, 2021, 04:28 (IST)

Recently, social media managed to kill Mr Bean yet again. On November 22, fans of British actor Rowan Atkinson (66)—best known for playing the eccentric television character Mr Bean—panicked when a Twitter handle in the guise of US telecaster Fox News spread the hoax that has been resurfacing every few years since 2012. Among the various international and national media that debunked the news was TOI.

THIS throwback picture of Gulshan Grover with ‘Mr Bean’ will drive away your Monday blues

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Dec 07, 2020, 09:34 (IST)

Gulshan Grover recently shared a throwback picture of himself with Rowan Atkinson, popularly known as ‘Mr Bean’, and it is sure to drive away your Monday blues.

Rowan Atkinson didn't want to voice for Zazu in 'The Lion King'

Oct 29, 2018, 15:33 (IST)

'The Lion King' is one of the most iconic Disney movies and continues to be a fan favourite but Rowan Atkinson has revealed he was initially not willing to be the voice of Zazu, Mufasa's right-hand hornbill. ​

Nashik pleasant at 3 degrees celsius below normal

TNN / Apr 23, 2017, 12:41 (IST)

The constant drop in city temperatures over the last three days has made the weather pleasant for citizens unlike other cities reeling under the heatwave across the state.

#MrBean25: When Rowan Atkinson brought Mr Bean to Buckingham

PTI / Sep 07, 2015, 10:07 (IST)

25 years have passed since Rowan Atkinson first introduced the world to the affable man-child Mr Bean and he marked the show's milestone anniversary with a celebration at Buckingham Palace, London.

International stars and the roles that stuck to them

TNN / Mar 24, 2015, 11:05 (IST)

What comes to your mind when you hear the name Jon Snow? A long-haired and sexy guy who carries a sword, right? April 12 is fast approaching and the Game of Thrones realm will have ample space for actor Kit Harington to swoon his female fans across the globe.

Elite members of the highly educated Hollywood brigade

TNN / Oct 27, 2014, 00:20 (IST)

After having girls swoon over his charming character of Harry Osborn in Spiderman and winning praises for his acting prowess in 127 Hours, James Franco is in the news for something quite different from acting — academics.

Hoax news makes residents spill beans

TNN / Nov 23, 2013, 11:45 (IST)

If you come across the news of the death of Mr Bean (actor Rowan Atkinson) on your Facebook account or WhatsApp and you are curious to know more by opening a link, then think twice.
